row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.PROMPTSET.SEND_DASHBOARD
row.description: Used in the template to set all required parameters

row.xui: <dialog height="255" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="551"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Send analytics report"><properties><entry name="text">Send analytics report</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: ANALYTICS_DASHBOARD#
row.xui:
<combo alt="1" dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" filter="0" focus="1" id="ANALYTICS_DASHBOARDs.00" nl="1" strict="1" text="Dashboard" tooltip="Choose the dashboard that you want to send via email. Must be shared by the user you are currently using." vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/>
<properties> <entry listparam="" name="reference" reftype="EXEC">PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.VARA.GET_SHARED_DASHBOARDS</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Dashboard</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">ANALYTICS_DASHBOARDs.00</entry> <entry name="dynamic">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">1</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Choose the dashboard that you want to send via email. Must be shared by the user you are currently using.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </combo>

row.name: EMAIL_MESSAGE#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="EMAIL_MESSAGEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="1" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Message" tooltip="Message of the email, will also contain the link to the shared dashboard" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Message</entry> <entry name="multiline">1</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">EMAIL_MESSAGEs.00</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Email message, link to the shared dashboard will be added by default.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: EMAIL_PDF#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="EMAIL_PDFs.00" nl="1" text="Attach PDF" tooltip="Attach pdf report to the email." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO_PROMPT_TRUE_FALSE_VALUE</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Attach PDF</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">EMAIL_PDFs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Attach pdf report to the email.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>

row.name: LABEL1#
row.value: The email will contain a public accessable link to the dashboard, you can also attach the report as:
row.xui: <label fill="b" id="LABEL1s.00" nl="1" text="The email will contain a public accessable link to the dashboard, you can also attach the report as:" tooltip="" alt="0"> <properties> <entry name="text">The email will contain a public accessable link to the dashboard, you can also attach the report as:</entry> <entry name="id">LABEL1s.00</entry> <entry name="tooltip"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> </properties> </label>
